Test scenerio: Validate the working of register account functionality.
Test case title: Validate regestering an account by providing only mendatory fields
Pre-requisites: Open the application    (https://demo.opencart.com) in any browser.
Test steps: 1.click on my account.                    2.select register from dropdown menu.                                                        3.enter new account details into mendatory fields (first name,last name,email,telephone,password,password confirm,privacy policy)with valid inputs.                                                         4.click on continue button.(er-1)          5.click on continue button on account success page.
Expected result: 1.user should be logged in in account success page and proper display should be shown in the page.                                         2.user should be taken to account page    and confirm mail should be send the the registated mail.

Test scenerio: Validate the working of register account functionality.
Test case title: Validate 'thank you for regestering ' email send to the regesterd mail.
Pre-requisites: Open the application    (https://demo.opencart.com) in any browser.
Test steps: 1.click on my account.                                                2.select register from dropdown menu.                                                        3.enter new account details into mendatory fields (first name,last name,email,telephone,password,password confirm,privacy policy)with valid inputs.                                                         4.click on continue button.                                        5.click on continue button on account success page (er-1,er-2).                                                                                  6.click on the login page link from the email body(er-3).
Expected result: 1.validate a confirmation mail for regestering the account is sent to the registered email address with email subject, body and from address .                            2.Validate Login page link in the in the email.            3.user sgould be taken to login page.

Test scenerio: Validate the working of register account functionality.
Test case title: validate  showing proper warning message when no inputes are provided to the mendetory fields and click continue button.
Pre-requisites: Open the application    (https://demo.opencart.com) in any browser.
Test steps: 1.click on my account.                                                2.select register from dropdown menu.                                                        3.enter no values in the mendetory (first name, lastname, email , telephone, password, password confirm,privacy policy) fields.                                                               4.click on continue button.  er-1
Expected result: 1.proper warning message shown  foe each medetory fields.     Such as                                                                 a. for first name display "name must be between 2 to 32 characters' warning message  .                                                                            b.   for last name display "name must be between 2 to 32 characters'  warning message .                                                                            c.for email display ' email does not appear to be valid'  warning message.                                                                                                  d.  for password display ' password must be between 5 to 20 characters ' warning message.                                                  e. for telephone display 'telephone must between 9 to 11 characters' warning message .                               f.for privacy policy display ' You must agree to the privacy policy ' warning message.
